review: I expected more, but the price is fair.
author: Juan Jose Merced

review: All as advertised and more!  Especially the Bosch series.
author: ERH

review: Wasn't sure what to expect based on the price tag, if I had known it was this great I would have bought two a long time ago. Awesome product absolutely love it
author: michael yurkevicz

review: Couldn't sign on to my passowrd protected wifi, needs to be plugged into power to work well, which is as convenient as it looks.
author: GI

review: Way better than Chromecast - across the board. Don't need another device to get a service like Netflix. Love the clicker.
author: John

review: Works great! I like it waaay more than my chromecast.
author: Ben S

review: Love it so far, especially for the price!  Remote works well, powered fine by my TV (a Seiki SE39UY04) via USB (it does complain about low power, but runs fine).  Seems plenty fast to me!  I debated between this and the Fire TV box and, while I often buy the nicer option (for that cost difference especially) I haven't regretted the Fire TV Stick at all.
author: Peter Porter
